meaningMnemonic: If you want to <kanji>look at</kanji> and give a quick <kanji>inspection</kanji> of some stuff then you're just <vocabulary>browsing</vocabulary>. You don't want to buy yet, you just have to give a look.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
